entry.title: Onomy Test Network
entry.content:
Onomy Test Network #2 Coming Soon

We have been following the progress of the Onomy Protocol closely. Although up for a short time, we have contributed to the successful first Test Net and are geared up and ready to run a Validator for the 2nd Onomy Test Net.
entry.summary: <h3 id="Onomy-Test-Network-2-Coming-Soon"><a href="#Onomy-Test-Network-2-Coming-Soon" class="headerlink" title="Onomy Test Network #2 Coming

entry.title: About
entry.content: Lila Holdings is dedicated to using our extensive technical experience to contribute to the security of Proof of Stake networks. By staking our own funds, we are incentivized in keeping our validators running 24/7. In doing so, all of our delegators benefit right along with us.
entry.summary: Lila Holdings is dedicated to using our extensive technical experience to contribute to the security of Proof of Stake networks. By staki
